seo.title: PageSpeed Score Benchmarks for Shopify Baby Stores (2026)
seo.meta_description: New parents expect fast, trustworthy stores. See how 16 Shopify baby stores perform on pagespeed score. Median: 50, Top 10%: 68. Free benchmarks.
keywords: best pagespeed score for baby stores
how to improve pagespeed score shopify

key_findings: The average Baby store scores 49 on PageSpeed, falling into Google's "poor" category
Top 10% of stores achieve scores of 68+, giving them a significant competitive advantage
There's a 36 point gap between top and bottom performers in this niche
More than half of stores in this niche fall below Google's minimum acceptable threshold
Source: Boostra analysis of 16 Shopify baby stores, 2026-01-04.
how_to_improve: Audit and remove unused CSS and JavaScript to reduce page weight
Implement efficient caching strategies for static assets
Optimize your Shopify theme by removing unnecessary apps and code
Use optimized, properly-sized images throughout your store
Minimize main-thread work by deferring non-critical JavaScript
Reduce the impact of third-party scripts like analytics and chat widgets
Consider a performance-focused Shopify theme if your current theme is bloated

jsonld.name: PageSpeed Score Benchmarks for Shopify Baby Stores
jsonld.description: Performance benchmark data for 16 Shopify stores in the baby products industry, measuring pagespeed score.

acceptedAnswer.text: PageSpeed Score is Google's comprehensive performance metric (0-100) that evaluates your site's speed and user experience. Higher scores correlate with better SEO rankings and conversion rates.

mainEntity.name: Why does PageSpeed Score matter for baby stores?

acceptedAnswer.text: Parents prioritize convenience and reliability when shopping for their children. A fast, easy-to-use store becomes a trusted go-to for repeat baby supply purchases.

mainEntity.name: What is a good PageSpeed Score for Shopify baby stores?

acceptedAnswer.text: Based on Boostra's analysis of 16 Shopify baby stores, the median pagespeed score is 50. Top-performing stores in this niche (top 10%) achieve 68. Scores of 90+ are considered 'good', 50-89 'needs improvement', and below 50 'poor'.

mainEntity.name: How can I improve my baby store's PageSpeed Score?

acceptedAnswer.text: Audit and remove unused CSS and JavaScript to reduce page weight. Implement efficient caching strategies for static assets. Optimize your Shopify theme by removing unnecessary apps and code. Use optimized, properly-sized images throughout your store. For a personalized analysis of your store's specific issues and opportunities, consider a professional CRO audit.

mainEntity.name: How does my store compare to other baby stores?

acceptedAnswer.text: You can compare your pagespeed score against our benchmarks. If your score is better than 50 (the median), you're in the top half of baby stores. If you're better than 68, you're among the top 10% performers in your industry.
